title: GoldMineralsNetwork
author: GoldMineralsNetwork
content: Gold Minerals Network - GMN is a token backed by Gold Mineral Deposits.GMN is ERC20 based token in Ethereum Chain.4 billion tokens have been created, each backed with 1 Euro worth of gold mineral deposits.Source code: https://etherscan.io/address/0xe4de696ded2997b7d3f526940ddd0505932fd18e#codeOfficial Explorer: https://etherscan.io/address/0xe4de696ded2997b7d3f526940ddd0505932fd18eWebsite and Whitepaper will be released later.

comments.author: Man0fKnight
comments.body: OK.  So I don't like how you worded "4 billion tokens have been created, each backed with 1 Euro worth of gold mineral deposits"Gold Mineral Deposit is traditional gold rich ground (before any mining has been accomplished)...if this is the case, what is the 1 Euro's worth based off of...lease price...ebay price?  Because if you buy the stuff on ebay 1 Euro worth of dirt might net you a penny worth of gold, if you're lucky.Who is backing you with the funding that you supposedly have 4 billion Euros worth of mineral?
